name: Eventility
tag_list: event, club, group, place, community, organise, promote, email
overview:
Eventility® is an easy to use platform to organise and promote events, clubs, groups, communities and places.

We remove the pain and hassle of running and marketing any activity or business, however large or small.

Whether accessed through the web, mobile or API, both consumer and business customers will save time and money, and generate more revenue, by using Eventility’s free and paid-for services.
